about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.

Faraway in the arid outskirts of the Outlands, right on the edge of a neverending sea of dunes and treacherous desert roads, a small provincial town is planning something unprecedented in its history: a journey to the capital.

“Heir of the Roads” is the first DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow young town leader Fairuza through a journey full of perils, surprises, and heartfelt moments.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
